Broadsword: Restores 40% of the target's max Health.
Restores 100% of the target's max Health.

Restores 100% of the target's max Mana.

Revives the target and restores 100% of its max Health.
Cures Poison, Silence, Blind, Break, Magic Break, Slow, Grounded, Bleed and Hemorrhage.
Deals magic damage while ignoring a portion of the target's Magic defense.
Deals magic Fire damage to a target and its friendly neighbours.
Deals magic Thunder damage and inflicts Magic Break I.
Deals magic Water damage and inflicts Slow I to a target and its friendly neighbours.
Deals magic Ice damage and inflicts Grounded.
Deals magic Wind damage to a target and knocks it back.
Deals magic Holy damage and inflicts Blind to a target and its friendly neighbours.
Deals magic Darkness damage and inflicts Poison and Silence.
Deals magic damage and inflicts Poison.
Deals magic damage and inflicts Blind.
Deals magic damage and inflicts Silence.
Deals magic damage and inflicts Break I and Magic Break I. Removes Shell and Protect.
Inflicts Bleed I and Hemorrhage I.
Inflicts Slow I to all enemies.
